title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - AIUXDesigner (Revised)
description: This revised task details the updated project requirements for AIUXDesigner. The documentation includes identification of target users, essential features, expected functionality, design constraints, performance goals, security considerations, scalability requirements, usability aspects, necessary integration with existing systems or APIs, a specific technical architecture (frontend, backend, and database), strategy for handling user behavior data and preferences to optimize generated designs, data privacy and security policies with GDPR compliance considerations, user personas and use cases, feature prioritization, design principles and guidelines, integration strategies, technical architecture blueprint, performance testing strategy, and security vulnerability assessment. This documentation will serve as a foundation for further development. This task is intended to be reviewed by the project manager after approval.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the AI model, user interface, and data storage components.

title: Develop AI Model
description: Research, design, and implement the AI model for generating and optimizing user interface designs.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the AIUXDesigner tool, including the input and output interfaces.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for user data, preferences, and generated designs.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure the application's integrity.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the AIUXDesigner tool.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.
